stats_panel.description: Stats Panel: Optional panel with custom title and 0-10 stat items. Title captured from markdown heading text (e.g., '## Analytical Approach {.stats}' → title: 'Analytical Approach'). Panel only renders if {.stats} marker present.

title.description: Custom title for stats panel, captured from markdown heading. Falls back to 'Analytical Approach' if not provided.

items.description: 0-10 stat items. Can be simple strings (auto-assigned labels) or objects with custom labels.

oneOf.description: Stat value with auto-assigned label based on position
Stat item with custom label and value

label.description: Custom label for this stat (e.g., 'Approach:', 'Data Type:')

features_panel.description: Features Panel: Optional panel with custom title and 0-5 feature items. Title captured from markdown heading text (e.g., '## Key Benefits {.features}' → title: 'Key Benefits'). Panel only renders if {.features} marker present.

title.description: Custom title for features panel, captured from markdown heading. Required when {.features} marker present.

items.description: 0-5 feature items. Can be simple strings (auto-assigned headings) or objects with custom headings.

oneOf.description: Feature text with auto-assigned heading based on position
Feature item with custom heading and text

heading.description: Custom heading for this feature (e.g., 'When to Use:', 'Key Benefit:')
